summary: Import/Export Asset Domains Testing - Backend API 100% pass, Frontend button click issue identified

ui_bugs.issue: Button click does not trigger handleImportPreview function when clicked via Playwright automation. File upload works correctly (shows 'Validate 2 Rows'), but clicking the button does not make API call. Multiple click methods tried (click, dispatch_event, mouse.click, keyboard enter) - none work.
ui_bugs.reproduction_notes: Import dialog opens, CSV file is parsed correctly showing 'File loaded: 2 rows' and button text shows 'Validate 2 Rows', but clicking the button does not trigger the onClick handler. This appears to be a React/Radix Dialog interaction issue with automated testing.

integration_issues.flow: CSV File Upload â†’ Preview API Call
integration_issues.issue: The Playwright set_input_files does not trigger React onChange event automatically. Manual event dispatch is required. After file is properly loaded, the Validate button click does not trigger the API call.

action_items: CRITICAL: Debug why Validate button onClick handler doesn't fire in the Import dialog when clicked via automation
Check if Radix Dialog component is preventing event propagation
Verify the handleImportPreview function is properly bound to the Button onClick
Consider adding a type='button' attribute to prevent form submission issues
critical_code_review_comments: Backend API endpoints (export, import preview, import template) work correctly - all tests pass
Export with filters is correctly implemented and respects filter parameters
Import preview correctly categorizes domains into new/update/errors
The frontend button click not triggering may be a React synthetic event issue with the Dialog component

success_rate.frontend: ~70% - Export dropdown works, Import dialog opens, file parsing works, but Validate button click does not trigger API

seed_data_creation: None - used existing domains like moneysite.com for update testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend APIs verified working. Frontend issue is specifically with the Import dialog's Validate button not triggering onClick. The button exists, is visible, not disabled, shows correct text 'Validate 2 Rows', but clicking it (via Playwright click, dispatchEvent, mouse.click, or Enter key) does not call the handleImportPreview function. This needs debugging - may be related to Radix Dialog component or React event binding.

features_tested.export_button: PASS - Export dropdown shows 'Export as CSV' and 'Export as JSON' options
features_tested.export_csv_format: PASS - API returns CSV with all required fields
features_tested.export_json_format: PASS - API returns JSON with domain data and total count
features_tested.import_dialog_opens: PASS - Import CSV button opens dialog correctly
features_tested.template_download: PASS - Download Template button visible, API returns valid CSV template
features_tested.file_upload_parsing: PASS - CSV files are parsed and displayed in table
features_tested.validate_button_click: FAIL - Button click does not trigger API call
features_tested.preview_api: PASS - Backend API correctly validates and categorizes domains
features_tested.preview_sections: NOT TESTED - Could not reach this step due to button click issue
features_tested.confirm_import: NOT TESTED - Dependent on preview step
